comments.body: Why do we need a new dedicated DAR file for this test?

It would probably be interesting to have a chance to upload something for the first time during this test. No guarantee, but uploading `Test.dar` guarantees the opposite (i.e. you'll never upload something for the first time), which is probably not desirable.

We cannot make this guarantee, unless we synthesize a dalf package on the fly (which is likely not impossible). Anything else would be making assumptions during the test run that we cannot make (e.g. that the test tool in a specific release has never been run before against the same ledger).

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,75 @@

+final class PackageManagement(session: LedgerSession) extends LedgerTestSuite(session) {
+
+  private[this] val testPackageResourcePath =
+    "/ledger/ledger-api-test-tool/PackageManagementTest.dar"
